resolutions.title: Integrated graphics driver
resolutions.name: glamor
resolutions.description: Poor compatibility for parts of old graphics cards.

resolutions.name: bumblebee
resolutions.title: Use Bumblebee Solution
resolutions.description: Save power to reduce power consumption.

resolutions.name: prime
resolutions.title: Use NV-PRIME Solution
resolutions.description: For laptops with hybrid graphics, having best performance but must work with closed-source driver.
